attributes.action: Due to the Coronavirus Pandemic Brexit is now a dangerous distraction.
attributes.additional_details: The World is in the grip of the most significant threat to humanity from the Coronavirus. Brexit negotiations will simply take much needed resources away from the task of rebuilding our businesses, communities, and way of life. It is imperative that we work together now and work with our European partners.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300412

You may also wish to sign these petitions:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300297
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300026

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
